597     def create_secret(
598         self,
599         secret_name: str,
600         unencrypted_value: str,
601         visibility: str = "all",
602         selected_repositories: Opt[list[github.Repository.Repository]] = NotSet,
603         secret_type: str = "actions",
604     ) -> github.OrganizationSecret.OrganizationSecret:
605         """
606         :param secret_name: string name of the secret
607         :param unencrypted_value: string plain text value of the secret
608         :param visibility: string options all or selected
609         :param selected_repositories: list of repositrories that the secret will be available in
610         :param secret_type: string options actions or dependabot
611 
612         :calls: `PUT /orgs/{org}/{secret_type}/secrets/{secret_name} <https://docs.github.com/en/rest/actions/secrets#create-or-update-an-organization-secret>`_
613         """
614         assert isinstance(secret_name, str), secret_name
615         assert isinstance(unencrypted_value, str), unencrypted_value
616         assert isinstance(visibility, str), visibility
617         assert is_optional_list(selected_repositories, github.Repository.Repository), selected_repositories
618         assert secret_type in ["actions", "dependabot"], "secret_type should be actions or dependabot"
619

621             assert isinstance(selected_repositories, list) and all(
622                 isinstance(element, github.Repository.Repository) for element in selected_repositories
623             ), selected_repositories
624         else:
625             assert selected_repositories is NotSet
626 
627         public_key = self.get_public_key(secret_type=secret_type)
628         payload = public_key.encrypt(unencrypted_value)
629         put_parameters: dict[str, Any] = {
630             "key_id": public_key.key_id,
631             "encrypted_value": payload,
632             "visibility": visibility,
633         }
634         if is_defined(selected_repositories):
635             # Dependbot and Actions endpoint expects different types
636             # https://docs.github.com/en/rest/dependabot/secrets?apiVersion=2022-11-28#create-or-update-an-organization-secret
637             # https://docs.github.com/en/rest/actions/secrets?apiVersion=2022-11-28#create-or-update-an-organization-secret
638             if secret_type == "actions":
639                 put_parameters["selected_repository_ids"] = [element.id for element in selected_repositories]
640             if secret_type == "dependabot":
641                 put_parameters["selected_repository_ids"] = [str(element.id) for element in selected_repositories]
642 
643         self._requester.requestJsonAndCheck(
644             "PUT", f"{self.url}/{secret_type}/secrets/{urllib.parse.quote(secret_name)}", input=put_parameters
645         )
646 
647         return github.OrganizationSecret.OrganizationSecret(
648             requester=self._requester,
649             headers={},
650             attributes={
651                 "name": secret_name,
652                 "visibility": visibility,
653                 "selected_repositories_url": f"{self.url}/{secret_type}/secrets/{urllib.parse.quote(secret_name)}/repositories",
654                 "url": f"{self.url}/{secret_type}/secrets/{urllib.parse.quote(secret_name)}",
655             },

657         )
